nodes.bodyText: What's the reason of disabling this lint check?
@miankhalid In plural string french language standards are different then others so it cause an error of Implied quantity that's why we disable it
Ok, it makes sense to mark this as a warning too instead of disabling the check. Which has been done in 501ccfd 👍
Won't it be better if we mark this option as a warning instead of disabling it?
